name: LUNA 4 Facial Cleansing & Firming Massage for Combination Skin
categories: Skincare, High Tech Tools, Facial Cleansing Brushes
about: What it is:A customizable tool that lifts away visible dirt, oil, and makeup residue and offers firming facial massages that leave the skin clean and healthier..What Else You Need to Know:This tool features manual cleansing and massage controls with customization in the FOREO app. The brush head has broader touchpoints to deep clean with thinner touchpoints at the bottom and can be further personalized by cleansing intensity and firming massage routines..Clinical Results:Participants in a 28-day consumer trial reported the following benefits:
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To unlock LUNA 4, pair with the FOREO For You app. .-Once paired and settings decided, device can be used without the app..-Remove all makeup, dampen skin, and apply your favorite cleanser..-Press the universal button to turn on the LUNA 4..-Choose between Gentle, Regular, or Deep Cleanse modes using the buttons on the device..-Cleanse using circular movements on cheeks and forehead, gliding up and down the nose..-Press and hold the button for three seconds to turn off device..-Rinse and pat your face dry. .-Apply other skincare products..-Access firming massage manually or follow the instructions on the FOREO app to activate the firming massage function.

reviews.review_text: I have never used a device like this for skincare so I was very excited to finally try this out. You have to set up an account and program the device through an app - very cool. After a couple of weeks of using, I have noticed an improvement on my combination skin. My serums and makeup applies easier now.

reviews.review_text: I really enjoy that there's a variety of brushes for different skin types.  The silicone bristles feel super soft on the skin and leaves my face feeling smooth and clean without any damage. Free by Foreo

Since my other face brush brand went out of business I had to explore other options and Foreo did not disappoint! I love how customizable it is - there are three different cleansing modes and five different massage routines for you to chose from. My favorites are the regular cleansing mode and deep tissue massage. I can already tell I get a deeper clean than just using my hands and my skin feels clean but not stripped. I love how easy it is to clean and you donu2019t have to buy replacement heads (which is the issue I had with my last brush).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Foreo for combination skin makes such a big difference in the way I clean my face. It deep cleans my skin, removes dirt, oil and makeup and cleans my pores and after cleansing I can use my favorite serum with the Luna 4 for a firming massage. I love how easy it is to use, navigate and customize the different cleansing and massaging settings. It has regular, gentle and deep cleansing modes and five firming massage routine to choose from - lymphatic drainage, shiatsu, deep tissue, trigger point, and reflexology massage and they all feel so relaxing. The app is easy to set up. The design makes it so comfortable to hold and move the device around my skin. It does not only deep cleanses my skin in a gentle way but prepares my skin for massaging my skin with my favorite serum. My skin feels so clean, soft, and smooth afterwards and just looks radiant. It enhances my skincare routine and I highly recommend this Luna 4 for combination skin.

reviews.review_text: This is my first Foreo device and the pad feels really nice and soft. I used it for cleansing and it made my skin feel so clean and good.
